name: AntGame
description:
This game is so cool and about a lil cool ant guy running around and fighting lesser ants.

I am currently just posting it now so my friends and anyone else who wants to play it does.

I plan to add things like story, more mechanics, enemies, and bosses. Right now is an extremely early example of it, but has the basic gameplay.

HOW TO PLAY:

Shift to sprint (useless rn)

left mouse to shoot thorns

wasd to move

mouse over enemies to aim

try and collect all picnic baskets

roses give thorns

GOAL: Get as many points as you can. This is the current objective, but will possibly change in da future :p
